articles.title: Was Pam Oliver Having a Medical Emergency on the Sidelines of the Packers-Rams Game? - Sportscasting
articles.description: Fox veteran NFL sideline reporter Pam Oliver delivered a report during Saturday's telecast and her speech caused concern for fans watching, some suggesting she might be having a medical emergency.
articles.content: Pam Oliver has been a veteran NFL sideline reporter at Fox Sports for 25 years. She’s covered multiple Super Bowls and is one of the most respected reporters in the business. During Saturday’s playof… [+4353 chars]
